caseTitle: Abdul Qudoos v. Commandant Frontier Constabulary, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Peshawar & another
tagline: Frontier Constabulary employees are civil servants and in a matter relating to the terms and conditions of service, they can approach the Service Tribunal. An act of Court shall prejudice no one. High Court in its writ jurisdiction rightly exercised its discretionary powers to avoid grave injustice while transmitting the matter to FST.
